pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()Within the nest of an antlion queen sat an egg strangely larger than the rest. Whilst some may have assumed this were a healthy larva, they could not be more wrong. Out from the clutch crawled an abomination, bent and twisted into a shape resembling

a blade. It seemed the creature suffered great pain from this transformation, and in a display of mercy, the Great Sage dampened its conscious thoughts, leaving little more than a husk-like weapon to lay by his side. The pain was now over, yet the hunger was left ever-growing.
